WorkItem.Description:
Hi Everyone,

As given in documentation of ver 1.7.9 on page 15 that we can retrieve a cell by doing:

$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getCellByColumnAndRow(1, 8)->getValue();


I want to know that is there any possibility that can I get 'Coordinate of a cell' by enter its row and column. For example, is there a function to which i input row and column and a cell (1,8) and it will return its coordinates (i.e. B8)?

Looking forward for kind help.

Thank you.

Best Regards
DH
WorkItem.Summary: Getting Coordinate of a cell with the help of its column and row
